name: Danger In The Shadows Quiz / Test | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
False.

	Sara Walsh and Dave Richman are brother and sister. Sara had a twin named Kim who died.

questions.text: What profession is Adam Black in?
questions.explanation:
Ex-football player.

	Adam Black was a professional football player. After losing a Super Bowl to the Vikings, he retired.

questions.text: Where did Adam and Sara meet?
questions.explanation:
Elevator.

	Adam and Sara met in the elevator after a power outage occurred. He took care of her when the outage caused a recurring nightmare to surface.

questions.text: What did Dave want to become if he didn't have to be an FBI agent?
questions.explanation:
Pilot.

	Dave loves to fly and he and Sara have their own plane which is used to get Sara out of the city or country at a moment's notice. He commented in the book that if he didn't have to be an FBI agent to protect Sara, he would have been a pilot.

questions.text: What is the alias Sara goes by to write her thriller novels?
questions.explanation:
H. Q. Victor

	Sara writes children's books and thrillers. The thrillers are written to deal with the kidnapping she endured as a child. She goes by the name H.Q. Victor after her ranch in Texas and her stepfather's last name.

questions.text: Was Dave with Sara and Kim when they were kidnapped?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Dave tried to stop the men from taking his sisters, but they shoved him out of the way. He feels responsible and that's why he has been protecting Sara for over twenty years.

Two.

	Only one kidnapper was captured, but he never talked. The second kidnapper sends Sara packages often to remind her he's out there. When Adam and Sara started dating, the kidnapper resurfaced and caused both of them to separate to keep them safe.

questions.text: Where were they going to send Sara to keep her safe?
questions.explanation:
Seattle.

	Dave told Adam at the ranch they were going to send Sara to Seattle where she would have to start her life over again. Adam decided that he could either live without her or go to Seattle and live with her.

questions.text: Did Sara kill the second kidnapper?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After Thomas Krane, the second kidnapper, was found and put in jail, he escaped and came after Sara at the ranch. Dave and Adam were hundreds of miles away. Sara's head ranch hand, Quinton, shot and killed Thomas when they both exited the house.

questions.text: Who planned Sara and Adam's wedding?
questions.explanation:
Adam.

	Adam planned the whole wedding without Sara's knowledge. He used Ellen's, Sara's best friend, wedding preparations to disguise his own wedding preparations. They were married after Ellen's ceremony.
